text: allah yarai nervaliyil celuttukirano, avar tam nervalipperravar avar; innum avan yarai valikettil vitukirano a(ttakaiya)varukku utavi ceyvor avanaiyanri veru evaraiyum nir kanamattir; melum avarkalaik kurutarkalakavum, umaikalakavum, cevitarkalakavum tam mukankalil kuppura varumpati ceytu kiyama nalil onru cerppom; innum avarkal otunkum itam narakameyakum; (naraka neruppu). Anaiyum potellam nam avarkalukku neruppai atikamakkuvom
